name: 2022 13th International Conference on E-business, Management and Economics
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted excellent papers by ICEME 2022 will be published by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec,et al. ICEME 2022 ISBN: 978-1-4503-9639-4
